channel.title: CVE Feed for Nvidia Corporation -- SHIELD TV

item.title: CVE-2017-6296|2024-09-16T18:49:20.194Z -- nvidia%20corporation -- shield%20tv
item.description: NVIDIA TrustZone Software contains a TOCTOU issue in the DRM application which may lead to the denial of service or possible escalation of privileges. This issue is rated as moderate.
